title: Pictures teach at Penfield
brief_description: Illustrates the role of audio-visual materials in elementary and secondary education by dramatising the teaching methods used at Penfield, New York, Central School District, where films, slides and film-strips are integral parts of the curriculum. The story centres around the reactions of two students, brother and sister, to audio-visual instruction.
